caption: A2A Data
description: Data for the A2A record extension.
name: a2a_data

protocol_version.caption: Protocol Version
protocol_version.description: Version of the A2A protocol used by the agent.

card_data.caption: A2A Card Data
card_data.description: The A2A card data structure itself that contains information about the agent's capabilities and communication details.

capabilities.caption: Capabilities
capabilities.description: List of capabilities supported by the agent for A2A communication.

transports.caption: Supported Transports
transports.description: Supported transport protocols for A2A communication.

input_modes.caption: Supported Input Modes
input_modes.description: Supported input modes supported by the agent for A2A communication.

output_modes.caption: Supported Output Modes
output_modes.description: Supported output modes supported by the agent for A2A communication.

security_schemes.caption: Supported Security Schemes
security_schemes.description: Supported security schemes for A2A communication.
